a = np.ones((10,))
pickle.dump(a, open('single_object.pnm', 'wb'))
self.ws.clear()
with pytest.raises(Exception):
    self.ws.load_project('single_object.pnm')
b = {'test': a}
pickle.dump(b, open('single_object.pnm', 'wb'))
self.ws.clear()
with pytest.raises(Exception):
    self.ws.load_project('single_object.pnm')
